1370: Eremboldus moved to Kerckstraet.A.5 after marriage.
Got married to Erkenradis at age 19 in 1370.
Had a son with Erkenradis, Hetselo, at age 19.
1372: Had a son with Erkenradis, Bodekine, at age 21.
1373: Had a daughter with Erkenradis, Sarre, at age 22.
1375: Had a son with Erkenradis, Rissewint, at age 24.
1376: Had a son with Erkenradis, Tielen, at age 25.
1377: Had a daughter with Erkenradis, Sophia, at age 26.
1379: Had a son with Erkenradis, Eylwardo, at age 28.
Lost son Eylwardo when Eylwardo was 1 years old.
1380: Had a son with Erkenradis, Didderic, at age 29.
Lost son Didderic when Didderic was 1 years old.
1381: Lost daughter Sophia when Sophia was 5 years old.
Has seen several of their children die.
1382: Had a daughter with Erkenradis, Truden, at age 31.
